reporting-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

title.narrative: Consolidation of the marketer ECOAGRO of the Organic Producers Association of Paraguay.. Consolidation of the marketer ECOAGRO of the Organic Producers Association of Paraguay

description.narrative: Support the science and practice of food, feed, and fiber production (including forestry, wildlife, fisheries, aquaculture and floriculture) and its relationships to natural resources, processing, marketing, distribution, utilization (including nutrition), and trade.

This award strives to support the science and practice of food, feed, and fiber production (including forestry, wildlife, fisheries, aquaculture and floriculture) and its relationships to natural resources, processing, marketing, distribution, utilization (including nutrition), and trade. In addition, this award Asociación de Productores Orgánicos (APRO) will increase incomes and improve the quality of life of approximately 290 families by strengthening its capacity to market and sell fresh and processed agricultural products. It will also provide technical assistance and training on organic production. APRO's goals are to increase the association's sales volume diversify and expand its product base to include new value-added products and grow organic fruits and vegetables off-season. The project will directly benefit 1000 individuals as well as another 1820 indirectly.. mailing-address.narrative: 1331 Pennsylvania Ave. NW, Suite 1200 NorthÂ Washington, DC 20004

description.narrative: The Government of Paraguay is making significant advances in fighting corruption and impunity and eradicating extreme poverty. Encouraged by a recently approved Freedom of Information Law and widely available public notices, citizens are denouncing irregularities and sending a clear message that corruption will not be tolerated. Although high levels of income inequality remain, Paraguayan government programs are producing positive results in reducing poverty and in countering illicit activities in the northern region. U.S. assistance programs add momentum to these positive developments, helping Paraguay strengthen its democratic institutions and supporting more equitable and environmentally sustainable economic growth.
